Name: Short Horror Story
About the game: As the title says, the game is a short horror story about a lone traveler who encounters a mysterious visitor in a calm desert night. From there, what appeared to be a simple traveler's story begins to develop into a terrible reality. From there, the previously calm and peaceful night becomes a game of life and death in a labyrinthine abandoned mine. An horror FPS made in two weeks, Short Horror Story, is a non linear horror tale that develops in a creepy shooter game.
